data.text: This is a simple tool, which allows the writer, to systematically breakdown each paragraph into component sentences, iterate over them until the paragraph is complete.
versions: >to systematically breakdown each paragraph into component sentences, and iterate over new versions until the paragraph is complete.
to systematically breakdown each paragraph into component sentences, iterate over them until the paragraph is complete.

data.text: The interface is split into two parts which can be resized, and there is a file and settings menu on the left, which remains hidden, to keep the work area clean.
To open the menu move your mouse to the left edge of the screen. The menu will open to reveal various self explanatory preferences.
